name: Margherita pizza
description: Prepared in a wood oven to give you the best possible pizza available.

name: Pepperoni pizza
description: Prepared in a wood oven to give you the best possible pizza available.

name: cheese burger
description: A cheeseburger is a hamburger topped with cheese.

name: french fries
description: French fries, chips, finger chips, french-fried potatoes, or simply fries, are batonnet or allumette-cut deep-fried potatoes.

name: Coke
description: Coca-Cola, or Coke, is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company.

name: Sandwich
description: A sandwich is a food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Chicken curry is a dish originating from the Indian subcontinent.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Chicken wings are white meat, even though they're juicier and have a more concentrated poultry flavour, like dark meat.

name: Yogurt
description: Yogurt also spelt yoghurt, yogourt or yoghourt, is a food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk.

name: Apple Pie
description: An apple pie is a pie in which the principal filling ingredient is apples.

name: Hotdog
description: A hot dog is a food consisting of a grilled or steamed sausage served in the slit of a partially sliced bun.

name: Popcorn
description: Popcorn is a variety of corn kernel which expands and puffs up when heated; the same names also refer to the foodstuff produced by the expansion.

name: Chicken nuggets
description: A chicken nugget is a food product consisting of a small piece of deboned chicken meat that is breaded or battered, then deep-fried or baked.

name: Barbecue chicken
description: Barbecue chicken consists of chicken parts or entire chickens that are barbecued, grilled or smoked.

name: Tacos
description: A taco is a traditional Mexican dish consisting of small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla topped with a filling.
